person.persName: Franklin S. Loyd (Crittenden County, Kentucky, farm laborer and Lieutenant (U.S.A))

body.p: Crittenden County, Kentucky, farm laborer and soldier. Livingston, Kentucky Native. Son of Isaac Loyd and Mary Hill Loyd. Resident of Crittenden County, Kentucky, in 1850. Farm laborer in Crittenden County, Kentucky, in 1860. Served as a First Lieutenant (U.S.A.) in the 20th Kentucky Infantry on January 30, 1862.
